features: Removes grease, limescale and tranishing from machine surfaces
Fits snuggly in the upper basked during conditioning cycle
Helps to keep the dishwasher odor free
Recommended use is 4 to 5 times per year
Maintains good condition and appearance of the dishwasher
body.description: Dishwashers are exposed to a lot of food residue including starch and fats. Regular use of Miele dishwashing machine conditioner can actually help extend the life of your machine and ensure great wash performance is maintained. Recommended use: 4 - 5 times a year (circumstantial).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works and descales somewhat too
reviews.reviewText: Worked very well with the end result of a fresh clean interior of a dishwasher!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, just too expensive
reviews.reviewText: Good product, just too expensive. It does a great job of cleaning the dishwasher and is easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product. Wish I knew about it years ago.
reviews.reviewText: After owning my Miele dishwasher for over 10 years, I found out about this product. Used it once, and my dishwasher now looks brand new inside! Just as shinny as a new dishwasher. Completely cleaned the powdery coating that had accumulated inside. I can see that my glassware looks more shiny as well. Very easy to use. Great value for the money because I purchased a two pack. I am now set for the year! I will continue to purchase this product as long as I own my Miele dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little pricey, but it truly cleaned my Miele dishwasher well.
reviews.reviewText: Liked how well the product worked. Disliked the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent!! Dishes look great again
reviews.reviewText: A tech at Miele recommended buying and trying this when I called and complained that my dishwasher was leaving a film on silverware and glasses, despite trying to do everything right (I've owned Miele dishwashers for several years and they can be finicky but they are fantastic when you get the details right and know what to do to make them perform their best). Well, this easy little step saved me a few hundred dollars because I now use one every 3 months and my dishwasher is working perfectly---never had to pay for a service call and I really appreciate the Miele tech helping me troubleshoot and giving me this option rather than a pricey service call. Seems to keep the machine clean and make sure residual grease is not circulating and being deposited back onto the dishes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really Helps our Dishwasher.
reviews.reviewText: Our Dishwasher works OK But it slowly suffers from buildup very difficult to reach. When the Dishwasher gets more and more cranky, we break down and use one of these. It cleans the slow hard water buildups hidden deep in the system. We only have to run our dishwasher once a week. So for us this is a perfect fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I have used before and works very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Deep clean the cleaner!
reviews.reviewText: I run the conditioner cycle as recommended by Miele. It gives a deep clean & fresh look & aroma. Also helps to clean the manual dw filter regularly.
